item.title: Kubernetes Multi-environment and Multi-application Orchestration Practice
item.author: Damon
item.description: By implementing a Kubernetes multi-environment and multi-application orchestration with the same configuration by YAML(Manifests), Kustomize and Helm, we can quickly get started with Kustomize and Helm and understand the differences between them.

item.title: Kubernetes Container Healthcheck and Graceful Termination
item.author: Damon
item.description: Kubernetes container health checks and graceful termination enhances production stability, reduces deployment incidents and false alarms.

item.title: Alibaba Cloud Official Vector Icons and draw.io Custom Libraries
item.author: Damon
item.description: I collected a complete set of Alibaba Cloud vector icons and generated the draw.io icon library.

item.title: Use git-crypt to Encrypt Files in Git
item.author: Damon
item.description: git-crypt is a tool for encrypting and decrypting files that integrates seamlessly with Git repositories, allowing users to securely store and share sensitive data.

item.title: Lightweight Kubernetes Distributions Practices
item.author: Damon
item.description: Deploying and managing native Kubernetes clusters could be challenging, so the community developed lightweight Kubernetes distributions to make operations easier.

item.title: What are Private IP Addresses
item.author: Damon
item.description: In the Internet addressing architecture, the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) and the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) have reserved various IP addresses for special purposes.

item.title: Enhance AWS S3 Data Security with Bucket Level Policy
item.author: Damon
item.description: After restricting the source of S3 Bucket access requests through Bucket Level Policy, the data in AWS S3 Bucket can still be secured even if AKSK is compromised.

item.title: Notes from "Rich Dad Poor Dad"
item.author: Damon
item.description: The rich buy assets. The poor only have expenses. The middle class buy liabilities they think are assets.
